# baltimorecensus

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of baltimorecensus is to offer convenient access to U.S. Census Bureau boundary data for Baltimore City, Maryland.

## Installation

You can install the development version of baltimorecensus like so:

``` r
pak::pkg_install("elipousson/baltimorecensus")
```
